name: Bastion of the Sun
description:
The Mages of Truscar must defend the last Bastion from the advancing Orcs. The city depends on the strength that the Mages provide in order to survive, not only from the oppressing Orc invasions but also to fend off the bitter cold of Everwinter.

Controls:

Mouse (left mouse button only)

Select tower from bottom store and then select tile to place it on.

Try losing once also to get the full story!
